sn47.35:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ;
sn47.35:5.5: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.35:5.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti.
sn47.35:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viditā vedanā uppajjanti, viditā upaṭṭhahanti, viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchanti.
sn47.35:6.3: Viditā vitakkā uppajjanti, viditā upaṭṭhahanti, viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchanti.
sn47.35:6.4: Viditā saññā uppajjanti, viditā upaṭṭhahanti, viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchanti.
sn47.35:6.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajāno hoti.
